name: Spoil Hard: 5 Second Rule
description:
Take control over Spoil Hard Spaghetti and help him break the rule of 5 second. 

......

With your friend!

Controls:

Keyboard+Gamepad
E,RMB,WASD | Right Shoulder, Face Button Bottom, Left Stick

P.S. Had so much fun tweaking animations. And had no time left for balancing gameplay... Who wants to see complete version of this game?
